DOC.brief_summary: Coloscopy may be a painful procedure for the patient. This is due to a loop-formation of the coloscope. A 3D-real time imager produced by Olympus creates a real-time image of the scope while a traditional fluoroscopy device will only show instant pictures. We want to investigate whether the 3D-imager causes the patient less pain and is more time consuming than ordinary fluoroscopy
DOC.brief_title: Improving Quality of Colonoscopy Using a 3D-imager
DOC.detailed_description: Results published in Holme et.al. Gastrointestinal Endoscopy 2011;73:1215-1222.
DOC.criteria: All patients referred for coloscopy on an outpatient basis Pregnancy Pacemaker Lack of ability to understand information given Prior resection of the colon/rectum Demanding analgetics prior to start of procedure
